casebody.data:
RIGSBY et al.
v.
POTTER, ON BEHALF OF the ESTATE OF Paul S. WIGGINS, Jr., et al. and Potter Fiduciary Services, Inc., Administrator for the Estate of Paul S. Wiggins, Jr., Robert S. Wiggins, and Patricia Wiggins Perlow A165838 Court of Appeals of Oregon. February 6, 2019

Affirmed without opinion.
